sequence:
Gentle and Sweet Ooshio!

<size=45>Time for Overtime!</size>

scripts.say: Though it was now late into the night, I still had a big pile of work to do.
There's just no end in sight...
Commander, the deadline for these docs is tomorrow mornin', so ya can't rest till ya gone through 'em...
I'll stay here 'n help ya out, so just keep on truckin'...
Ooshio brought me a glass of milk.
How 'bout some milk? It's gettin' late, so I reckon ya could use somethin' warm to drink.
As I was sipping my hot milk, I looked at the mountainous pile of paperwork left. I let out a sigh and continued working.
Guess I won't be getting any sleep tonight...
Ooshio woke me up. I guess I ended up falling asleep in my office.
G'mornin', Commander. Guess ya ended up fallin' asleep in yer office...
I done prepared ya some food. Once yer ready, gimme a call 'n I'll heat it up for ya.
That's when I noticed that my coat was hanging on my shoulders, like a blanket. Ooshio must've covered me with it while I was sleeping.
Sorry for havin' to tell ya this when ya just woke up, but...
Ooshio placed her hand on a stack of papers. The mountain of paperwork from yesterday was now only a fraction as big.
Thanks to yer hard work, ya almost done achieved yer goal~ Reckon ya can manage the final stretch?

options.content: Promise Ooshio it'll be a cinch

scripts.say: Haha♪ I knew I could count on ya~
It felt like I got done with the remaining work in the blink of an eye.
